font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 轻蔑，鄙视，不屑： reject or dismiss as contemptible or unworthy
【例】 They were scorned as fanatics. 他们被指责为狂热分子。
【近】 despise, disregard, flout, contemn, disdain, slight, look down (on or upon)
【反】 adulate; venerate, honor, respect, revere 谄媚；尊敬

【记】 score 自己得分了就瞧不起别人
